courses.name: Introduction to C Programming
courses.description: Learn C programming basics: variables, loops, functions. Build a strong foundation for programming.

courses.name: Introduction to Algorithms
courses.description: Explore fundamental computer science algorithms. Gain problem-solving skills for real-world challenges.

courses.name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
courses.description: Master C++ for data structures and algorithms. Code efficient solutions for complex problems.

courses.name: Basic Data Structures
courses.description: Learn arrays, linked lists, and stacks. Acquire essential data structure skills for software development.

courses.name: Introduction to OOP Python
courses.description: Discover Python's object-oriented principles. Create reusable code with classes and objects.

courses.name: Software Engineering
courses.description: Best practices in software development and project management. Deliver high-quality projects efficiently.

courses.name: AWS and Cloud Computing
courses.description: Explore Amazon Web Services and cloud computing. Deploy scalable solutions for modern applications.

courses.name: Database (MySQL)
courses.description: Master MySQL for efficient database management and querying. Store and retrieve data effectively.

courses.name: Problem-Solving Part
courses.description: Enhance problem-solving skills through coding challenges and exercises. Tackle real coding problems.
